passive.name: Teary-Eyed
passive.description: At the start of the battle, the DMG dealt to all allies decreases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s). At the same time, immediately restores HP to all allies equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of the respective HP difference between the characters' Max HP and current HP.
